questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's primary surface?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What material appears to constitute the main packaging?
Describing the texture, is the packaging visibly smooth or rough?
What is the primary language used on the package labeling?
What is the printed weight quantity visible on the package?
What is the color of the brand name printed on the bag?
What is the brand name displayed prominently on the packaging?
What kind of printing is used for the text on the packaging (e.g., raised, flat)?
Considering the presence of any seals or closures, what type is visible?
Based on the visible text, what is the type of product contained within?
What type of markings (if any) are present on the package aside from text?
What is the overall design style of the packaging (e.g., minimalist, ornate)?
Disregarding brand labels, what other patterns are found on the bag's main surface?
Is there any visible indication of a manufacturing or expiration date?
